item.title: 汇丰银行新任首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）面临的五大挑战
item.description: 汇丰银行新任首席执行官乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）将面临的首要挑战包括：在利率下降的情况下实现经济增长、应对中国与西方之间的紧张关系，以及管理汇丰在中国挥之不去的不良贷款危机中的风险。【原文：Delivering growth amid falling interest rates, navigating tensions between China and the West, and managing HSBC's exposure to China's lingering bad loans crisis will be among the top challenges facing the bank's new CEO Georges Elhedery.】

item.title: 日本铃木公司的目标是在十年内将主要车型的重量减轻 15
item.description: 日本铃木汽车公司（Suzuki Motor）周三表示，该公司计划在未来十年内将小型奥拓掀背车的重量减轻 15%，目的是降低汽车的能耗，并将这些技术成果应用于其他车型。【原文：Japan's Suzuki Motor said on Wednesday it plans to cut the weight of its small Alto hatchback by 15% over the next decade, aiming to reduce the vehicle's energy usage and employ those technology gains in other models.】

item.title: 早间竞价黄金闪耀，通胀不安
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国考虑制定更严厉的贸易规则打击中国芯片市场
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，拜登政府已通知盟友，如果东京电子和 ASML Holding NV 等公司继续向中国提供先进的半导体技术，拜登政府将考虑对中国采取最严厉的贸易限制措施。【原文：The Biden administration has informed allies that it is considering using the most severe trade restrictions available for China if companies including Tokyo Electron and ASML Holding NV continue giving the country access to advanced semiconductor technology, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 汇丰银行任命 Georges Elhedery 为集团首席执行官
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Ltd）周三表示，已任命乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）为集团首席执行官，任命自 9 月 2 日起生效。【原文：HSBC Holdings Ltd said on Wednesday it has appointed Georges Elhedery as its group chief executive, with effect from Sept. 2.】

item.title: 统计局称中国 6 月 16-24 岁人口失业率为 13.2
item.description: 中国统计局周三表示，除大学生外，中国16至24岁人口的失业率在6月份为13.2%。【原文：The jobless rate for 16 to 24 year olds in China, excluding college students, was at 13.2% for the month of June, the country's statistics bureau said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 考虑到中国的长期需求，中国的黄金购买高峰稍纵即逝
item.description: 据一位政策业内人士、行业专家和数据显示，尽管中国在 5 月和 6 月暂停了官方黄金购买，但其金银持有量占储备的比例仍然很低，地缘政治紧张局势持续存在，因此中国仍有很大的购买欲望。【原文：China still has plenty of appetite for official gold purchases despite pausing in May and June, as its bullion holdings remain low as a share of reserves and geopolitical tensions persist, according to a policy insider, industry experts and data.】

item.title: 降息呼之欲出，黄金再创新高，特朗普言论打击台湾股市
item.description: 周三，随着市场为全球利率下降做好准备，黄金创下历史新高，债券也出现反弹，而台湾股市则在美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普对台湾国防承诺态度冷淡后出现下滑。【原文：Gold hit a record and bonds rallied on Wednesday as markets prepared for global interest rates to fall, while stocks in Taiwan slipped after U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump sounded lukewarm in his commitment to the island's defence.】

item.title: 特朗普称台湾应支付防务费用后，台积电股价下跌逾 2
item.description: 在美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）称台湾应支付国防费用后，合约芯片制造商台积电的股价周三下跌超过 2%。【原文：Shares of contract chip manufacturer TSMC fell more than 2% on Wednesday after U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump said Taiwan should pay for defence.】

item.title: 美联储再次降息，美元摇摆不定
item.description: 周三，美元汇率涨跌不一，此前，美国零售销售数据好于预期，美元汇率受到了短暂的小幅提振，交易员们关注美联储最早将于 9 月份降息的前景。【原文：The dollar was mixed on Wednesday after a modest but short-lived boost following better-than-expected U.S. retail sales data, as traders focused on the prospect of Federal Reserve rate cuts as early as September.】

item.title: 美国将于 8 月发布限制中国汽车软件的拟议规则
item.description: 一位高级官员周二表示，美国商务部计划在下个月发布有关联网汽车的拟议规则，并预计将对中国和其他被视为对手的国家制造的一些软件施加限制。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department plans to issue proposed rules on connected vehicles next month and expects to impose limits on some software made in China and other countries deemed adversaries, a senior official said Tuesday.】

item.title: 需求放缓抵消供应紧缩，油价保持稳定
item.description: 由于中国需求增长减弱的迹象与美国石油库存下降的前景发生冲突，周三亚洲早盘油价持稳，全球基准布伦特油价在上一交易日创下的一个月低点附近徘徊。【原文：Oil prices were steady in early Asian trade on Wednesday, with global benchmark Brent hovering near the one-month low it hit in the prior session, as signs of weakening demand growth in China clashed with the prospect of declining U.S. oil stockpiles.】

item.title: 特朗普称 "我支持 TikTok"，美国可能禁用 TikTok
item.description: 共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他支持 TikTok，尽管如果中国母公司字节跳动未能剥离该短视频应用在美国的资产，TikTok 可能会被禁止。【原文：Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said he supports TikTok even as a potential ban looms if Chinese-parent company ByteDance fails to divest the short video app's U.S. assets.】

item.title: 惠誉恢复达美航空投资级评级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周二将达美航空的信用评级上调至投资级，理由是其资产负债表在过去三年中有所改善。【原文：Fitch Ratings on Tuesday upgraded Delta Air Lines' credit rating to investment grade, citing improvements in its balance sheet in the past three years.】

item.title: 日本商业景气喜忧参半凸显经济前景黯淡
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 月度调查周三显示，日本制造商对 7 月份的经营状况更有信心，而服务业的信心则有所减弱，这反映出经济前景并不乐观。【原文：Japanese manufacturers became more confident about business conditions in July whereas those in the service sector cooled, the monthly Reuters Tankan survey showed on Wednesday, reflecting a patchy economic outlook.】

item.title: 前铂金伙伴公司总裁在欺诈案中避免入狱
item.description: 周二，现已解散的 Platinum Partners 对冲基金的创始人被判处 6 个月的家庭监禁，因为他参与了检察官所说的欺诈一家石油天然气公司债券持有人的计划。【原文：The founder of the now-defunct Platinum Partners hedge fund was sentenced on Tuesday to six months of home confinement over his role in what prosecutors called a scheme to defraud bondholders of an oil and gas company.】

item.title: 亚洲：全球信号不一，印尼呼吁加息
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 由于比索走软，美国移动公司第二季度转为亏损
item.description: 墨西哥电信巨头 America Movil 周二公布净亏损为 10.9 亿墨西哥比索（6,000 万美元），原因是当地比索贬值，尽管收入有所增长。【原文：Mexican telecommunications giant America Movil on Tuesday posted a swing to a net loss of 1.09 billion Mexican pesos ($60 million), citing the depreciation of the local peso even as revenues edged up.】

item.title: 美国众议院小组就医疗成本问题与药房福利经理举行听证会
item.description: 美国众议院监督小组周二表示，将与美国药房福利管理公司的高管举行听证会，讨论这些公司在医疗成本上升中的作用。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives oversight panel said on Tuesday it will hold a hearing with executives from U.S. pharmacy benefit managers on the role of the firms in rising healthcare costs.】

item.title: 精神航空第二季度营收预计为 12.8 亿美元，低于此前预期
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周二表示，第二季度的收入预计约为 12.8 亿美元，低于此前的预期，原因是非机票收入低于预期。【原文：Spirit Airlines on Tuesday said revenue for the second quarter is estimated to be around $1.28 billion, lower than previously projected, citing lower-than-expected non-ticket revenue.】

item.title: 参议员要求美国电话电报公司就大规模黑客攻击美国客户通话数据一事做出答复
item.description: 两名美国参议员周二要求 AT&T 公司回答有关 4 月份发生的大规模黑客攻击事件的问题，该事件导致该美国无线公司约 1.09 亿个客户账户被非法下载。【原文：Two U.S. senators on Tuesday asked AT&T to answer questions about a massive hacking incident in April that resulted in the illegal downloading of about 109 million customer accounts at the U.S. wireless company.】

item.title: 马斯克称 SpaceX 将把总部从加利福尼亚州迁往德克萨斯州
item.description: 火箭公司 SpaceX 首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二在 X 网站上发表文章称，公司总部将从加利福尼亚州迁往德克萨斯州的星际基地。【原文：Rocket company SpaceX will move its headquarters to Starbase, Texas from California, CEO Elon Musk said on Tuesday in a post on X.】

item.title: 流亡中国商人郭文贵在美国欺诈案审判中被定罪
item.description: 郭文贵是一名流亡海外的中国商人，也是北京共产党政府的直言不讳的反对者，周二他在美国的审判中被判有罪，罪名是从网上追随者那里窃取数亿美元。【原文：Guo Wengui, an exiled Chinese businessman and outspoken opponent of Beijing's communist government, was convicted on Tuesday in his U.S. trial on charges of stealing hundreds of millions of dollars from online followers.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司在美国银行称可能出售资产有利后上涨
item.description: 周二，华纳兄弟发现公司股价上涨超过 6%，此前美国银行（BofA）全球研究部称，如果该公司探索战略选择，包括潜在的出售，可以为股东创造更多价值。【原文：Shares of Warner Bros Discovery rose more than 6% on Tuesday after Bank of America (BofA) Global Research said the company could create more value for its shareholders if it explored strategic options, including a potential sale.】

item.title: 美联储主席库格勒称近期数据表明通胀率将向 2% 的目标迈进
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）周二表示，最近的数据表明，通胀率将继续下降至美国央行设定的2%的目标，她提到了最近几个月价格压力的加速下降、工资的放缓以及企业对工人的需求与求职人数之间正在出现的平衡。【原文：Recent data suggests inflation will continue to decline to the U.S. central bank's 2% target, Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said on Tuesday, citing the faster drop in price pressures in recent months, moderation in wages, and an emerging balance between businesses' demand for workers and the number of people looking for jobs.】

item.title: 美国航空业敦促国会解决 FAA 设施 "被忽视 "的问题
item.description: 在一系列报告引起人们对空中交通管制设施老化的警觉之后，美国主要航空团体和工会敦促国会解决联邦航空管理局设施资金持续短缺的问题。【原文：Major U.S. aviation groups and unions urged Congress to address persistent shortfalls in funding for Federal Aviation Administration facilities after a series of reports raised alarm about aging air traffic control facilities.】

item.title: 史酷比制造商可就涉嫌山寨产品起诉 Build-A-Bear
item.description: Build-A-Bear Workshop 声称其 Skoosherz 毛绒玩具未经授权山寨了沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下一家公司生产的流行毛绒玩具 Squishmallows。【原文：A U.S. judge rejected Build-A-Bear Workshop's effort to dismiss a lawsuit claiming that its Skoosherz plush toys were unauthorized knockoffs of Squishmallows, the popular plush toys made by a unit of Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway .】

item.title: 美国银行高管讨论消费者前景
item.description: 美国银行从更高的贷款利息支出中获得了一笔意外之财，但一些高层管理人员的评论表明，他们可能会面临前途未卜的困境。【原文：U.S. banks have reaped a windfall from higher interest payments on loans, but commentary from some top executives suggests they could face an uncertain path ahead.】

item.title: TC 能源公司称美国法庭驳回其对 Keystone XL 项目提出的 150 亿美元索赔要求
item.description: 加拿大 TC 能源公司周二称，自由贸易仲裁法庭驳回了该公司要求美国政府就取消其 Keystone XL 项目赔偿 150 多亿美元的申诉。【原文：Canada's TC Energy said on Tuesday a free trade arbitration tribunal had tossed out its claim to recover more than $15 billion from the U.S. government for the cancellation of its Keystone XL project.】

item.title: 美国钢铁企业面临季度利润不振、价格进一步下跌的局面
item.description: 据分析师称，美国顶级钢铁制造商预计第二季度盈利将出现下滑，并可能在进入夏季淡季时面临钢材价格进一步回落的额外压力。【原文：Top U.S. steelmakers are expected to post a decline in second-quarter earnings and could face additional pressure from a further retreat in steel prices heading into a slow summer season, according to analysts.】
